name: Angels
startIntroPart1: We must bring salvation to this world.
declaringWar: We are not here to destroy, but to bring you salvation.
attacked: Even the lord cannot forgive your act.
defeated: Forgive me my lord, for failing to defeat the evil spirits...
hateHello: You still have a chance to pay for your sins.
afterPeace: We knew that you are not truly evil.
tradeRequest: We brought you some wonderful trade offer.
uniques: May choose [2] additional belief(s) of any type when [founding] a religion
